Package spacesurvival.model.gameobject.main

Class MainObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • spacesurvival.model.gameobject.GameObject
      • spacesurvival.model.gameobject.movable.MovableObject
        • spacesurvival.model.gameobject.main.MainObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collideable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, ChaseEnemy, FireableObject
    public abstract class MainObject
extends MovableObject
    A game object with main functionalities, including life, impact damege and status.
